name: Armillary Sphere
oracle_text: {2}, {T}, Sacrifice Armillary Sphere: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: The mysterious purpose of two of the rings had eluded Esper mages—until now.

name: Assassinate
oracle_text: Destroy target tapped creature.
flavor_text:
"This is how wars are won—not with armies of soldiers but with a single knife blade, artfully placed."
—Yurin, royal assassin

name: Augury Owl
oracle_text:
Flying
When Augury Owl enters the battlefield, scry 3. (Look at the top three cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Aura Gnarlid
oracle_text:
Creatures with power less than Aura Gnarlid's power can't block it.
Aura Gnarlid gets +1/+1 for each Aura on the battlefield.
flavor_text: Kill a gnarlid with your first blow, or it'll cheerfully show you how it's done.

name: Auramancer
oracle_text: When Auramancer enters the battlefield, you may return target enchantment card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "In memories, we can find our deepest reserves of strength."

name: Bramble Elemental
oracle_text: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Bramble Elemental, create two 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens.
flavor_text: In abandoned corners of Ravnica, nature has begun to reclaim what it once owned.

name: Cadaver Imp
oracle_text:
Flying
When Cadaver Imp enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: The mouth must be pried open before rigor mortis sets in. Otherwise the returning soul can find no ingress.

name: Cage of Hands
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
{1}{W}: Return Cage of Hands to its owner's hand.

name: Cancel
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text: "What you are attempting is not against the law. It is, however, extremely foolish."

name: Cultivate
oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: All seeds share a common bond, calling to each other across infinity.

name: Deny Reality
oracle_text:
Cascade (When you cast this spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

name: Dimir Aqueduct
oracle_text:
Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped.
When Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {U}{B}.

name: Dimir Infiltrator
oracle_text:
Dimir Infiltrator can't be blocked.
Transmute {1}{U}{B} ({1}{U}{B}, Discard this card: Search your library for a card with the same mana value as this card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. Transmute only as a sorcery.)

name: Erratic Explosion
oracle_text: Choose any target. Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonland card. Erratic Explosion deals damage equal to that card's mana value to that permanent or player. Put the revealed cards on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Fiery Conclusion
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
flavor_text: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

name: Fiery Fall
oracle_text:
Fiery Fall deals 5 damage to target creature.
Basic landcycling {1}{R} ({1}{R}, Discard this card: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.)
flavor_text: Jund feasts on the unprepared.

name: Flayer Husk
Fling
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Fling deals damage equal to the sacrificed creature's power to any target.
flavor_text: About halfway to the target, Snukk vowed that he had been tricked for the last time.

name: Fractured Powerstone
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{T}: Roll the planar die. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: The Thran learned to capture mana, but power inevitably escapes its bonds.

name: Gruul Turf
oracle_text:
Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped.
When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {R}{G}.

name: Hissing Iguanar
oracle_text: Whenever another creature dies, you may have Hissing Iguanar deal 1 damage to target player or planeswalker.
flavor_text: Viashino thrashes keep iguanars as hunting companions, giving them wounded captives as playthings.

name: Hyena Umbra
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has first strike.
Totem armor (If enchanted creature would be destroyed, instead remove all damage from it and destroy this Aura.)

name: Khalni Garden
oracle_text:
Khalni Garden enters the battlefield tapped.
When Khalni Garden enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 green Plant creature token.
{T}: Add {G}.

name: Liliana's Specter
oracle_text:
Flying
When Liliana's Specter enters the battlefield, each opponent discards a card.
flavor_text:
"The finest minions know what I need without me ever saying a thing."
—Liliana Vess

name: Mistblade Shinobi
oracle_text:
Ninjutsu {U} ({U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Mistblade Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, you may return target creature that player controls to its owner's hand.

name: Mudbutton Torchrunner
oracle_text: When Mudbutton Torchrunner dies, it deals 3 damage to any target.
flavor_text: The oil sloshes against his skull as he nears his destination: the Frogtosser Games and the lighting of the Flaming Boggart.

name: Nest Invader
oracle_text: When Nest Invader enters the battlefield, create a 0/1 colorless Eldrazi Spawn creature token. It has "Sacrifice this creature: Add {C}."
flavor_text: It nurtures its masters' glorious future.

name: Ninja of the Deep Hours
oracle_text:
Ninjutsu {1}{U} ({1}{U}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Ninja of the Deep Hours deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

name: Nullmage Advocate
oracle_text: {T}: Return two target cards from an opponent's graveyard to their hand. Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Our unity unmasks your deceit."

name: Okiba-Gang Shinobi
oracle_text:
Ninjutsu {3}{B} ({3}{B}, Return an unblocked attacker you control to hand: Put this card onto the battlefield from your hand tapped and attacking.)
Whenever Okiba-Gang Shinobi deals combat damage to a player, that player discards two cards.

name: Ondu Giant
oracle_text: When Ondu Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Some druids nurture gardens. Others nurture continents.

name: Penumbra Spider
oracle_text:
Reach
When Penumbra Spider dies, create a 2/4 black Spider creature token with reach.
flavor_text: When it snared a passing cockatrice, its own soul darkly doubled.

name: Primal Plasma
oracle_text: As Primal Plasma enters the battlefield, it becomes your choice of a 3/3 creature, a 2/2 creature with flying, or a 1/6 creature with defender.
flavor_text: Tocasia brushed the gears and cogs from the table. There, before two wide-eyed brothers, she began a lesson on raw elemental magic.

name: Quiet Disrepair
oracle_text:
Enchant artifact or enchantment
At the beginning of your upkeep, choose one —
• Destroy enchanted permanent.
• You gain 2 life.
flavor_text:
"Artifice has always stood upon nature's shoulders. Let us watch nature take a turn."
—Freyalise

name: Rancor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0 and has trample.
When Rancor is put into a graveyard from the battlefield, return Rancor to its owner's hand.

name: Rupture Spire
oracle_text:
Rupture Spire enters the battlefield tapped.
When Rupture Spire enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you pay {1}.
{T}: Add one mana of any color.

name: See Beyond
oracle_text: Draw two cards, then shuffle a card from your hand into your library.
flavor_text: Ancient lore locked in a mind driven mad is just as safe as when it was locked deep underground.

name: Selesnya Sanctuary
oracle_text:
Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield tapped.
When Selesnya Sanctuary enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}{W}.

name: Shimmering Grotto
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{1}, {T}: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text:
"This is the price of being last in the food chain. We must keep our places of beauty hidden away instead of displayed for all to see."
—Hildin, priest of Avacyn

name: Silhana Ledgewalker
oracle_text:
Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)
Silhana Ledgewalker can't be blocked except by creatures with flying.
flavor_text: Street folk call them "spire mice," but behind the mockery is an unspoken envy of the ledgewalkers' skill at avoiding harm.

oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice Terramorphic Expanse: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Devour 2 (As this enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice any number of creatures. This creature enters the battlefield with twice that many +1/+1 counters on it.)
{G}: Thorn-Thrash Viashino gains trample until end of turn.

name: Tormented Soul
oracle_text: Tormented Soul can't block and can't be blocked.
flavor_text: Those who raged most bitterly at the world in life are cursed to roam the nether realms in death.

name: Tukatongue Thallid
oracle_text: When Tukatongue Thallid dies, create a 1/1 green Saproling creature token.
flavor_text: Jund's thallids tried to disguise their deliciousness by covering themselves in spines harvested from the tukatongue tree.

name: Viridian Emissary
oracle_text: When Viridian Emissary dies, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
